hackathon-description-text: The all-women hackathon at the University of Maryland open to women of all ages, background, and skill level!
hackathon-rules:
Don’t use an old project, start something new instead! Obviously, alcohol, drugs, firearms, knives, weapons (including toys) are stricly forbidden. Read through the 
 for more details. All attendees agree to abide by the MLH code of conduct.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best use of Virtual Reality will receive one Oculus Rift per team member (up to 4) thanks to Facebook and Oculus.
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best hack made by a group of high schoolers or younger will receive swag from University of Maryland's Computer Science department!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best High School or younger Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best hack that works to increase social impact will receive 1 Amazon Echo per team member (up to 4) thanks to JPMorgan Chase!
The hack that uses the Capital One API the best will receive $250 amazon gift cards per team member (up to 4) thanks to Capital One!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of Capital One's API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4490 Rossborough Ln, College Park, MD 20742, USA
hackathon-location-address: 4490 Rossborough Ln, College Park, MD 20742, USA
hackathon-description-header: The all-women hackathon at the University of Maryland.
